channel.title: EternityX [Hyperion]
channel.description:
This project was started out of boredom by Dylan (From R-S) and myself. We will be using Hyperion and for a client we will be using MITB's srcAllDummiesRemoved. We work on this when we have spare time, so don't expect very frequent updates.
[ul][li]Did not start[/li] [li]Started; unfinished[/li] [li]Completed[/li][/ul]
[b]Basic Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Idle Logout[/li] [li]Private Messaging[/li] [li]Player Following[/li] [li]NPC Spawning[/li] [li]Dropping Items[/li] [li]Picking up Items[/li] [li]Trading[/li] [li]Equipment Bonuses[/li] [li]Character Design[/li][/ul]
[b]Skills (Non-combat):[/b]
[ul][li]Mining[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Runecrafting[/li] [li]Thieving[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Farming[/li][/ul]
Media so this thread doesn't get locked: [img]http://puu.sh/1iHev[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1jk9A[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1jkjG[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1imKC[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1jJEE[/img]
If you're interested in joining this project, PM me.

item.title: EternityX [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:8, topic:465142”][quote author=XxJtxX link=topic=569797.msg4131411#msg4131411 date=1351124425]

I meant on your TODO list

Does your client have JAGGRAB? You seemed to have avoided that question.
[/quote]Ah. Yes, combat is on our TODO list and yes, our client has JAGGRAB.

Are you loading the cache from the server? As well as NPC definitions, and such?[/quote]Of course.

Read full topic

item.title: EternityX [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

  1. Those servers don’t even have JAGGRAB
  2. Hyperion has JAGGRAB and seeing people that use the server and totally ignore the feature surprises me.
  3. You can’t use JAGGRAB to grab a cache from the server that has external files.

Read full topic

item.title: EternityX [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Artem, you would be surprised. I see people that don’t even use JAGGRAB or the update server.

Not suprised. Many people having 300 mb cache with all those 600+ data and are not using jaggrab.

Read full topic
